OUTPUT_DIR.help_info: set awtk compiled export directory, default value is '', '' is system's value

TOOLS_NAME.help_info: set awtk compile's name, default value is None, None is system's value

INPUT_ENGINE.help_info: set awtk use input engine, default value is None, None is system's value

desc: if VGCANVAS is None, default value is NANOVG_PLUS
VGCANVAS.help_info: set awtk use render vgcanvas type, default value is None, None is system's value

desc: if NANOVG_BACKEND is valid, VGCANVAS must be NANOVG or ''
if VGCANVAS is NANOVG_PLUS, NANOVG_BACKEND must be GLES2/GLES3/GL3 or None
NANOVG_BACKEND.help_info: set awtk's nanovg use render model, default value is None, None is system's value

desc: HW is platform's MultiSample antialias, SW is VGCANVAS's soft antialias, NONE is no antialias
if NANOVG_BACKEND is GLES2/GLES3/GL3, LCD_COLOR_FORMAT must be bgra8888 or ''
if NANOVG_BACKEND is AGG/AGGE, LCD_COLOR_FORMAT must be bgr565/bgra8888/mono or None
LCD_COLOR_FORMAT.help_info: set awtk's lcd color format, default value is None, None is system's value

DEBUG.help_info: awtk's compile is debug, value is true or false, default value is true

PDB.help_info: export pdb file, value is true or false

SDL_UBUNTU_USE_IME.help_info: ubuntu use ime, this sopt is ubuntu use chinese input engine, value is true or false, default value is false

NATIVE_WINDOW_BORDERLESS.help_info: pc desktop program no borerless, value is true or false, default value is false

desc: pc desktop program do not resize program
NATIVE_WINDOW_NOT_RESIZABLE.help_info: pc desktop program do not resize program's size, value is true or false, default value is false

BUILD_TESTS.help_info: build awtk's gtest demo, value is true or false, default value is true

BUILD_DEMOS.help_info: build awtk's demo examples, value is true or false, default value is true

BUILD_TOOLS.help_info: build awtk's tools, value is true or false, default value is true

WIN32_RES.help_info: app's win32 res path, WIN32_RES=XXXXX, value's default='awtk/win32_res/awtk.res'
